The word "corporation" comes from the latin ______ meaning body, so it's an embodiment.
result.chn: 公司"这个词来自于拉丁文corpus,意思是身体,所以法人是种化身(金融市场课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: She cites oil consumption figures as an example that ______ the IEA's findings.
The astronauts made the ______ from a plastic bag, cardboard and tape.
Using a hollow tube, they drill into the tree and extract a 5-mm wide ______ that shows each ring starting with the most recent, just under the bark.
The ______ at this year's meeting, here at the South Korean seaside city of Busan, is that those measures have worked.
that you can think ______
President Obama wants all countries in the Group of Twenty to ______ their separate efforts to strengthen their economies.
Modest ______ theories, that is, say there's a value to being alive, but it can in principle be outweighed.
result.chn: 保守的有价值容器理论认为，活着有一定的价值，但是按道理它可以被超越。(死亡课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: You wanted to be finding the ______ for cancer, but you're not actually finding the ______ for cancer.
result.chn: 你想找到治疗癌症的方法，但你实际上没有在找治疗癌症的方法。(死亡课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: You can also hear Satan's ______ of the tyranny of heaven in this account of the rhyme as well. Like kingship, rhyme is a custom.
result.chn: 在这关于押韵的一段话中也可隐约听到,撒旦对上帝独裁的批判，押韵同王权一样都是惯例。(弥尔顿课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: "What many Rwandans face today is quite ______, where you are remembering but you have to forget in order to continue to live,".
Yet Egypt is not alone. Foreign investors worry about ______, mismanagement and security problems across North Africa and the Middle East.
If you have a project at work that is taking a lot of time and the ______ is coming up very soon,
result.chn: 如果你在工作上接手了一个项目，已耗费了大量时间，而交付日期马上就要到了，(SpeakingMax英语口语达人 : There is 课堂)

result.problem: Internal communication is just the ______ around what we're doing and why we're doing it and what our goals are and why the goals are like that. That's it.
result.chn: 内部的交流就是协调我们手头的工作,搞清楚我们为什么在做这些工作,为什么我们有这些目标，就是如此。(Twitter之父Jack.Dorsey演讲：好奇和灵感的力量课程节选 : 斯坦福公开课)

result.problem: The guiding thread of the book is the ______, the parts of the city and the parts of the soul.
result.chn: 本书的导引线索是,当中的相似之处，城邦一部份与灵魂一部份间的对称性。(政治哲学导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)
